shellHook:
# Create/update symlink to AGENTS rules directory
ln -sfn /nix/store/4li05383sgf4z0l6bxv8hmvgs600y56x-AGENTS/rules .opencode-rules

# Generate opencode.json configuration file
cat > opencode.json <<'OPENCODE_EOF'
{"$schema":"https://opencode.ai/config.json","instructions":[".opencode-rules/concerns/coding-style.md",".opencode-rules/concerns/naming.md",".opencode-rules/concerns/documentation.md",".opencode-rules/concerns/testing.md",".opencode-rules/concerns/git-workflow.md",".opencode-rules/concerns/project-structure.md",".opencode-rules/languages/python.md"]}
OPENCODE_EOF
